memberdef.name: Argon2d_Hash

detaileddescription.para: Argon2d Parameters Salt and password are the block header. Output length: 32 bytes. Input length (in the case of a block header): 80 bytes. Salt length (same note as input length): 80 bytes. Input: Block header Salt: Block header (SAME AS INPUT) Secret data: None Secret length: 0 Associated data: None Associated data length: 0 Memory cost: 1024 Lanes: 64
